trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around July 23rd 2008
Summary: V shaped object, red and orange flashing lights, and then it disappeared instantly
divs: Sighting Details1. I had a fight with my wife Annette, so I decided to go outside to get some fresh air. 2. I saw flashing lights above my house and then I noticed it was hovering above my house until it disappeared. 3. I had no doubt it was a UFO. 4. It was silent with red and orange flashing lights. 5. If I could I would have touched it but it was too far. 6. It disappeared instantly.
